Printer as a music player: Print a speaker and attach it to the printer to use it as a music player.
Printer as a scanner: Use the printer's scanning function to scan old photographs or documents and print them out in a different color or style.
Printer as a 3D printer: Use the printer's thermal head to print out 3D objects.
Printer as a printer phone: Print a small phone case and attach it to the printer to use it as a phone.
Printer as a portable printer: Print a small printer and attach it to the printer's body to use it as a portable printer.
